subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 21 points, jamming a powerful dunk in the final two minutes, as the host Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Boston Celtics, 88-77, on Monday night.
snippet: LeBron James scored 21 points, jamming a powerful dunk in the final two minutes, as the host Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Boston Celtics, 88-77, on Monday night.
